name: John Gone Fishing
description:
In John Gone Fishin' you move around in your boat to catch as many fish as possible.  This game has been reworked! To dodge logs, use A&D on pc, and tilt phone on mobile. Tap and hold to cast out your line to catch fish! Get as many fish as you can before you hit a log.

The one thing I did not create myself is the music on the title page-

https://freesound.org/people/alphatone/sounds/385876/

Happy Pirate Accordion
